alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 3:56AM EST until February 04 at 6:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey and southeast New York. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex
